abstracts.cdata!:
The Financial Sector Technical
            Assistance Project is designed to lay the foundations for
            continued financial sector reform by strengthening key
            elements of financial sector infrastructure. The project
            will support modernization of the national payments and
            clearing system and other central bank functions in the
            areas of financial sector regulation and supervision,
            accounting and internal audit, research and statistics,
            fiscal agent and monetary policy, and training in economics
            and banking. The project will further support the
            government's efforts in modernizing the overall
            national accounting framework, strengthening its domestic
            debt management and modernizing the framework for external auditing.
